meanings.definition: A small flowering plant with blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: I picked a beautiful myosotes from the garden.
meanings.sent2: The myosotes in the field added a lovely touch of blue.
meanings.sent3: The myosotes seemed to be whispering secrets to the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like myosotes in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the myosotes danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the forget-me-not belongs.
meanings.sent1: The myosotes genus includes many different types of flowers.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the myosotes genus to learn more about its species.
meanings.sent3: The myosotes genus had a family reunion with all the forget-me-nots.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of plants was as vast as the myosotes genus.
meanings.sent5: The myosotes genus symbolized the beauty of nature's diversity.
